10th Symposium on Environmental Satellites
10th Symposium on Environmental Satellites
page.enlisting:
• Galveston Hurricane – Landfall in Texas at 5 PM 09/08/1900 – > $500M (2008 dollars) in property damage – ~10,000 fatalities (out of a population of ~40,000) – No satellite data, no upper air network, no NWP – Estimated Category 4 at landfall • Katrina – Landfall (2nd) in Louisiana at 6 AM 08/29 2005 – > $90B in property damage (2008 dollars) – > 1800 fatalities (out of a population of ~1.5M) – Extensive satellite and conventional observations, good – Category 3 at Landfall • Galveston Hurricane
